author: Staff Reporter
text:
A Plus One student was killed after his two-wheeler rammed a parked lorry here on Friday.

The victim, 16-year-old Ragavendra, son of Rajendran, a TNSTC employee, was returning home from tuition on his two-wheeler with his friend, near Dharmapuri Four-Road Junction, at the time of accident.

According to the police, the victim reportedly lost control and rammed his vehicle into a parked lorry by the roadside. Raghavendra was taken to Dharmapuri Government Medical College Hospital and was later referred to a private hospital in Bengaluru, where he succumbed to injuries.
title: Killed in accident
